item.title: [Attackdefense.com] Privilege Escalation
item.author: llam16219@gmail.com (l3mnt2010)
item.description: Link https://attackdefense.com/challengedetails?cid=2021 Student to Teacher Find SUID binaries Using ‘Strings’ to view When we run the read-submission file. It will call and run the read-file. Read file is a binary file. We will use the PATH variable method First create another read-file executable file in / tmp with the content to generate a shell. Then use export to append the $ PATH variable. Then run the read-submission file. Because of the teacher’s suid, when running will generate the teacher’s shell:
